description:
The Bastl Thyme Plus is a delay unit with attitude and a drug problem. Let's take a look. Thanks to BASTL for supplying a unit
Get a THYME Plus at
Perfect Circuit: https://bit.ly/3wLhh9A
BASTL: https://shop.bastl-instruments.com/desktop/thyme-plus

Support the channel on Patreon: http://bit.ly/rmrpatreon
Take a lesson with me: https://rmr.media/education

Find my music here: 
Bandcamp: http://bit.ly/2Kq617o
Spotify: https://spoti.fi/2N40SoX
YouTube Music: https://bit.ly/3PZQ4ol
iTunes: https://apple.co/2pqh3SK
Amazon Music: https://amzn.to/2O9q1fe

Connect:
Twitter: http://bit.ly/rmrtwitters
Website: http://bit.ly/rmrmedia

00:00 intro
00:48 unit walkthrough
11:13 drum and bass beats
13:47 from pad to rhythm
16:23 envelope follower power
22:01 sequencing presets
title: BASTL Thyme Plus - More Than an Echo
